page.title: 05Amenities-Severn Valley/Wyre
page.content: The SW (Meadow Rise) area has food shops, pub & fish/chips nearby and other shopping, health services and library within 1 mile in Bewdley. For other areas these facilities are up to 5 miles away in Kidderminster or Bewdley and, as public transport is limited,own transport is an advantage. Trimpley has a busy Village Hall, Meadow Rise a public recreation ground with swings. Post and telephone boxes are within easy reach in all areas, post delivered daily except Sundays.In Trimpley,milk and papers are delivered daily, a grocery/bread van calls 3 times a week, mobile library once. School buses to St Anne's 1st/Middle (W of river),Bewdley High (all areas), Upper Arley 1st/Wribbenhall Middle (Trimpley)-walking distance for Meadow Rise.Swimming pool,hospital,theatre in Kidderminster, cinema in Bridgnorth.
